content.rendered:
The second square portrait in my neighbour series. Virginie lives in Paris. You might think I’m stretching my interpretation of ‘neighbour’ a bit far, but it isn’t because Virginie’s from a neighbouring country that she qualifies. In fact, she and I shared a bedroom for six months when we were working as human rights observers in Guatemala. So she’s a neighbouring spirit of mine.

And here’s one of the lovely Flore, also from Paris via Cameroon.
